item.title: How to Get Go2TV Working With Your Samsung Smart TV
item.author: bart@mikasoftware.com (Mika Software Corporation)
item.description: A recent reddit post on /r/golang titled Go2TV - cast videos to UPnP/DLNA MediaRenderers caught my interest. In this blog post I’ll try to get it working with my Samsung TV.

item.title: How to Build an API Server in Go - Part 4: Access Control
item.author: bart@mikasoftware.com (Mika Software Corporation)
item.description: Learn how to protect API endpoints with access and refresh tokens using the third-party jwt-go library.

item.title: How to Build an API Server in Go - Part 3: Postgres Database
item.author: bart@mikasoftware.com (Mika Software Corporation)
item.description: The purpose of this article is to provide instructions on how to setup postgres database with our application.

item.title: How to Build an API Server in Go - Part 2: Simple Database
item.author: bart@mikasoftware.com (Mika Software Corporation)
item.description: The purpose of this post is to learn how our basic API server can read the body of a request. In addition, we will learn how to use an easy-to-use simple database for beginners called scribble.

item.title: How to Build an API Server in Go - Part 1: Basic Server
item.author: bart@mikasoftware.com (Mika Software Corporation)
item.description: The purpose of this post is to provide instructions on how to setup a simple RESTful API server, in Golang, using only the net/http package and not any other third-party web framework. You will learn how to create REST endpoints within your project that can handle POST, GET, PUT and DELETE HTTP requests. This is the first post in a multi-post series.

item.title: How to Install Hugo From Git Bash for Window Users
item.author: bart@mikasoftware.com (Mika Software Corporation)
item.description: The purpose of this article is to help beginners understand how to do the advanced install of hugo static site generator (SSG).

item.title: How to Start a Personal Blog With Hugo a Static Site Generator Written in Go (Part 1)
item.author: bart@mikasoftware.com (Mika Software Corporation)
item.description: The purpose of this article is to help you setup a personal blog as quickly as possible. These are the instructions and notes I’ve written down when setting up my site that I’d like to share.

item.title: How to Write a Unit Test for a Remote Procedural Call in Golang
item.author: bart@mikasoftware.com (Mika Software Corporation)
item.description: Recently I have been learning about remote procedural calls (RPCs) in *Golang and realized I was unable to find an easy example on how to write a unit test for RPCs. In this post, I’ll explain how I figured out a solution.
